rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light and Vastu-compliant entrance. It includes storage for shoes and coats.

An integrated Mediterranean style kitchen adjoining a spacious living area, featuring high ceilings, large windows on the east to harness morning sunlight as per Vastu principles. The layout promotes social interaction while maintaining modern kitchen functionalities.
The master bedroom is designed with a balcony overlooking the garden for relaxation and fresh air, ensuring it's well positioned on the eastern side to align with Vastu principles.
A comfortable guest bedroom located next to the master bedroom, featuring a private balcony and ample natural lighting.
Serves both the master and guest bedrooms, incorporating efficient water usage fixtures.

A separate living space for domestic help located in a quiet area of the villa, with its own kitchenette and bathroom. The design adheres to local norms and is oriented towards the south or east to balance energy flow.

openings.name: East Windows
openings.description: Large windows in the living area for morning sunlight and fresh air, complementing Vastu principles.

openings.name: West Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to the servant's quarters' outdoor space or a secondary exit. Note: The plot is West-facing; however, main functional spaces are oriented towards beneficial directions.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: A Mediterranean styled rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and space for relaxation, incorporating greenery and seating areas. Designed to serve as an extension of the living area.

additional_features.name: Servants' Quarters Access
additional_features.description: Dedicated pathways from the main villa to ensure privacy while meeting local building norms.
